How does FWA manage potential conflicts of interest?
At FWA, we believe that transparency is the most effective tool for managing potential conflicts of interest. In accordance with the
, we proactively disclose all our ‘Affiliated Alliances’—strategic relationships with financial institutions and fund managers that allows us to deliver added value to our clients.
We maintain our professional objectivity and mitigate conflicts through three core pillars:

For our clients, FWA credits back all distribution fees (retrocessions) or commissions received from these Affiliated Alliances directly to your account. This ensures our financial interests are perfectly aligned with yours, as we never profit from choosing one manager over another.
We maintain these affiliations specifically to capture institutional-grade terms and discounted share classes that individual investors typically cannot access.

Regardless of our affiliations, every investment undergoes a rigorous screening process. We only recommend a product—affiliated or otherwise—if it is the absolute best fit for your family’s long-term objectives.
Is FWA a licensed investment firm?
: FWA operates as a private wealth
While FWA does not require a corporate license for this specific activity, our principal, Daniel Peretz, is a fully licensed Investment Marketer regulated by the Israel Securities Authority (ISA).

This structure allows us to offer the flexibility and sophistication of a Family Office, while ensuring that all regulated investment marketing activities are conducted by a licensed professional. Due to our strategic affiliations with leading financial institutions, we operate under an ‘Investment Marketing’ definition, ensuring full transparency regarding our alliances.
What’s the difference between a family office, my private bank, a wealth advisor, and an asset manager?
The difference lies in alignment and scope.

While banks and asset managers act as vendors focused on specific products or mandates, FWA acts as your Strategic Architect. We sit on your side of the table to provide holistic management across your entire balance sheet.

Instead of replacing these providers, we coordinate them. By leveraging our strategic alliances, we act as an informed bridge to institutional-grade opportunities and terms that are often unavailable to individual private banking clients—ensuring you get the best of the market, fully integrated into your family’s long-term strategy.
What’s the difference between discretionary and non-discretionary asset management?

In Discretionary Management, you authorize an advisor to make buy-and-sell decisions on your behalf without your prior approval. While efficient, this model often turns clients into passive participants who may lose touch with the logic behind their portfolio.
At FWA, we operate exclusively on a

basis. We believe you should remain the ultimate decision-maker. Our role is to provide the strategy, the education, and the recommendations, but we never execute a trade without your understanding and consent. This ensures you remain in full control and grow your financial knowledge alongside your wealth
Will I have more work to do if I hire a non-discretionary advisor?
"Not at all. Think of it as more control, less administration.

We distinguish between 'work' and 'decision-making.' We handle 100% of the heavy lifting—research, paperwork, bank coordination, and execution. Your role is elevated to the executive level: you review clear, simplified recommendations and give the final 'green light.'

While we insist on you being the ultimate authority over your wealth, we ensure the process is efficient. You get the peace of mind of being in the driver’s seat, without the burden of having to check the engine yourself."
Does FWA assist with Family Governance and Next-Generation education
Absolutely. We believe that preparing the family for the wealth is just as important as preparing the wealth for the family.

We work closely with you to design custom learning experiences and facilitate structured family meetings. These sessions are designed to foster communication and focus on the critical 'human' components of wealth management, including:
We operate on a transparent, Fee-Only basis.

Unlike traditional models that rely on hidden commissions or performance incentives, our fees are agreed upon in advance and are based on the complexity of your wealth enterprise (or a percentage of Assets Under Management).
: We do not charge performance fees. We believe this eliminates the temptation to take unnecessary risks with your capital just to chase short-term returns.
: As mentioned, any third-party commissions are fully credited back to you, ensuring our only revenue comes directly from the families we serve.
Can FWA help reduce family conflict?
: Conflict often stems from ambiguity or the feeling of not being heard. While we cannot promise perfect harmony, we promise to create a safe, structured environment where every voice counts.

We act as a neutral third party to bridge gaps between generations. By facilitating open communication and clear decision-making protocols, family members feel included rather than sidelined—which significantly reduces friction.
When deeper intervention is needed, we seamlessly integrate top-tier family governance experts and financial literacy mentors to ensure your family dynamic is as resilient as your portfolio.
Do I need to replace my current financial providers
Not at all. In fact, we encourage maintaining multiple banking relationships for diversification.
We don't replace your banks; we manage them. Acting as your objective advocate, we oversee all your providers to ensure they remain competitive and aligned with your broader strategy.

Through consolidated reporting, we act as an external auditor: reviewing transactions, verifying fee structures, catching errors, and ensuring that you are paying exactly what was agreed upon—and nothing more.
Does FWA create holistic financial plans?
Yes, we do. We create holistic financial plans to encompass all areas of your wealth enterprise, including:
Crucially, this plan is dynamic—it evolves constantly alongside your family’s changing needs and market conditions
We believe that consistent, transparent communication is vital to a successful partnership. While we tailor the frequency to your preference, our standard framework includes:
: A holistic review of your comprehensive financial plan.
: Real-time communication whenever market conditions or regulatory changes warrant your attention.
Beyond the schedule, we operate on an open-door policy—you have direct access to us whenever questions or opportunities arise.

Wealth brings freedom, but it also brings complexity. Since 2009, Family Wealth Advisors (FWA) has provided the strategic clarity,

w:r.w:delText: architectural planning

w:r.w:t: , and peace of mind that allow families to flourish across generations.

w:r.w:delText: Founded on a Gap in the Market
Family Wealth Advisors was established in Herzliya in 2009 by Daniel Peretz, a financial markets veteran with over three decades of global experience.

After years in the institutional world, Daniel recognized a critical flaw in how wealthy families were being served. While they had access to excellent bankers, lawyers, accountants and asset managers, these professionals worked in silos. No one was looking at the "Big Picture." The banker didn't know about the estate plan, and the accountant wasn't coordinating with the investment manager.
FWA was built to close that gap

We were founded on a simple premise: A family enterprise requires a CFO, just like a business enterprise. We set out to create a firm that would sit on the same side of the table as the family—selling no products, accepting no hidden commissions, and offering purely objective orchestration of the family’s financial life.

w:r.w:t: Professional Management for Your Personal Wealth
Family Wealth Advisors was established in 2009 by Daniel Peretz, a financial markets veteran with over 30 years of global experience.

After decades in the institutional world, Daniel recognized a critical disconnect in how wealthy families were being served. While they had access to excellent bankers, lawyers, and accountants, these professionals worked in silos. No one was looking at the "Big Picture," leaving the family with conflicting advice and uncoordinated strategies.
We believe that a family enterprise requires the same disciplined oversight as a business enterprise.

FWA was built to provide that oversight. We sit on the same side of the table as the family—selling no products and accepting no hidden commissions—to offer a purely objective orchestration of your financial life.

w:r.w:delText: From Chaos to Clarity

w:r.w:t: do not just manage portfolios; we manage

w:r.w:delText: ecosystems

w:r.w:t: Our role is to act as the central architect of your wealth. We coordinate every moving part of your financial life—investments, taxation, legal structures, and family governance—into a single, unified strategy.

Our mission is simple: to remove the burden of financial management from your shoulders, allowing you to focus on your business, your passions, and your family, confident that your financial house is in perfect order.
In an industry often driven by sales quotas and hidden incentives, we stand apart through our structure:
Fee-Only Model: Our only compensation comes from you. We never receive commissions from third parties.
Total Alignment: If we do receive a "retrocession" or commission from a fund, we credit 100% of it back to your account.
Fiduciary Mindset: We are not salespeople. We are fiduciaries, bound ethically and professionally to act solely in your best interest.
Our firm is led by a team of seasoned professionals combining expertise in global capital markets, taxation, and

w:r.w:delText: operational management

w:r.w:t: icon below each photo with link to the employee
Let’s discuss the architecture of your family’s future.

w:r.w:delText: Ready to experience a different caliber of wealth management?

w:r.w:t: places your needs and goals at the forefront of our decision-making and actions.

We are not owned by a bank, insurance company, or asset manager. We have no products to sell and no quotas to meet. This structural independence means we can objectively evaluate every option and recommend only what is genuinely best for your family.
When you work with FWA, you can be confident that our advice is driven solely by your interests—not by hidden incentives or corporate mandates.

Trust is built on sunlight. We believe in total clarity regarding fees, risks, and conflicts. We tell you what you need to hear—even when it’s uncomfortable—because protecting your wealth requires truth, not salesmanship

In a complex global market, "good enough" is a risk. We bring decades of multi-disciplinary experience—combining deep investment knowledge with legal and tax expertise—to solve problems that standard advisors often miss.

We approach every challenge with analytical precision and continuous learning. By staying ahead of regulatory changes and market developments, we ensure your wealth strategy is always grounded in the highest standard of professional care.
We don't think in quarters; we think in generations. Every decision we make is weighed against its long-term impact

We build resilient strategies designed to endure. Our focus is on creating a legacy that survives market cycles, regulatory shifts, and family transitions, ensuring your wealth remains a source of strength for decades to come.
Our compensation is solely derived from the families we serve through an established fee structure, maintaining transparency and simplicity.

We maintain a strict 100% Rebate Policy: any commission, distribution fee, or "retrocession" we receive from third-party affiliates is fully credited back to your account. This ensures that our financial interests are perfectly aligned with yours, as we never profit from your choices behind your back.

Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

Wealth is not just about investment returns; it’s about the integration of every financial decision you make. We act as your Personal CFO, connecting the dots between your legal structures, tax strategies, and family goals to create a unified ecosystem.

w:r.w:delText: Integration (The Glue)

w:r.w:t: families struggle with fragmented advice—bankers, accountants, and lawyers working in silos. We act as the central conductor, coordinating all your advisors to ensure every decision serves a single, unified strategy.

w:r.w:delText: Most families have a disconnected team: a banker, an accountant, and a lawyer who rarely speak to each other. We sit in the center, coordinating all your advisors to ensure everyone is working toward the same strategic vision.

w:r.w:t: True risk extends beyond market volatility. We build
of wealth: inflation, tax inefficiency, liability, and emotional decision-making. Our goal is not just growth, but the certainty that your capital survives

w:r.w:delText: (The Shield)

We redefine risk. It’s not just about market volatility. We protect your wealth against inflation, excessive taxation, litigation, and behavioral mistakes—ensuring your capital survives for generations.
Simplicity (The Clarity)

w:r.w:t: Complexity is the enemy of execution. We aggregate your entire balance sheet—across all banks, jurisdictions, and asset classes—into a single, transparent view. We replace administrative chaos with the clear data you need to make confident decisions.

w:r.w:delText: Complexity is the enemy of execution. We aggregate all your assets—across all banks and jurisdictions—into one clear, bottom-line report. You get the clarity you need to make decisions without the administrative headache.

w:r.w:delText: Comprehensive Family Office Services

w:r.w:t: In an era of global economic shifts, we provide the architectural framework for a successful wealth strategy. Our services are categorized into three core pillars.
We provide the architectural framework for your family enterprise—integrating investment, tax, and legacy strategies into a single, cohesive plan.
We replace the chaos of multiple providers with a single, integrated strategy.
Instead of selling products, we offer orchestration. We coordinate every aspect of your financial life—investments, tax, legal, and governance—into one unified ecosystem.

A Framework of Rigor, Alignment, and Institutional Discipline.

At Family Wealth Advisors (FWA), we do not manage portfolios in isolation; we manage them in the context of a family’s multi-generational legacy. Our philosophy is built on the belief that superior long-term outcomes are the result of a deliberate, repeatable process—not a reaction to the noise of the day.

We believe that markets are the most efficient processors of information. Our role is not to attempt to "outguess" the collective wisdom of the global markets, but to intelligently capture its growth.
Principled Allocation: We utilize a sophisticated, data-driven framework to identify global drivers of return.
Structural Diversification: We move beyond simple asset classes to focus on the underlying factors that drive wealth creation across various economic cycles.
In the Family Office context, risk is more than just "volatility"—it is the potential for a permanent loss of purchasing power. We view risk management as an architectural challenge.
Compensated Risk: We focus capital where the expected return justifies the exposure.
Strategic Liquidity: We ensure that every portfolio is structured to meet immediate liquidity needs without compromising long-term growth objectives.

The most significant variable in any investment plan is the discipline to see it through. As your family’s Chief Investment Officer, we act as a professional filter between the headlines and your capital.
Bridge: We provide the objective perspective necessary to maintain focus during market extremes.
Process over Impulse: Our decisions are governed by a predetermined framework, ensuring that strategy always triumphs over sentiment.
Our philosophy is built on a foundation of absolute alignment. As a multi-family office, we operate with a transparency that traditional institutions often lack.
Unconflicted Advice: We maintain a pure fiduciary standard. Our interests are uniquely aligned with yours, free from the constraints of proprietary products or hidden commissions.
Structural Efficiency: Our philosophy integrates tax-aware strategy and cross-border optimization into the core of the investment process.

Title: The Private Office Standard Subtitle: Move beyond traditional banking. Experience the precision of a Personal CFO.
Headline: Your Financial Ecosystem, Unified. A Family Office is not just wealth management; it is wealth architecture. While traditional banks

focus on selling products, a Family Office focuses on integrating strategy with direct execution. We act as your "Personal CFO," coordinating your entire financial life—investments, tax, legal, and estate—into a single, coherent strategy.
Headline: Is a Family Office Right for You? If you answer "Yes" to any of the following, traditional banking
: Do you manage assets across multiple banks, jurisdictions, or currencies?
: Does managing your wealth take time away from your business or family?
: Do your accountant, lawyer, and banker speak to each other? (Or do you have to mediate?)
: Are you concerned about how your children will handle the wealth?
: Who is checking the fees and performance of your banks?
Headline: The Golden Rules of Selection When selecting a Family Office, demand three non-negotiable standards:
Are they owned by a bank
We are 100% privately owned. We sell no products.
FWA Standard: We credit 100% of all third-party commissions back to your account.
: Do they see the whole picture?
; we optimize tax, legal structures, and family governance.
